CreateCommand.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tat.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: CreateCommand
<公共请求参数>

{
    "CommandName": "hello-command",
    "Description": "hello world",
    "Content": "bHM=",
    "CommandType": "SHELL",
    "WorkingDirectory": "/tmp",
    "Timeout": 60
}
CreateCommand.title: 创建命令

CreateInvoker.document: 北京时间 2021-09-01 00:00:00 在实例 ins-yx05ky8j 执行命令 cmd-m7uma92n
CreateInvoker.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tat.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateInvoker
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Name": "test-invoker",
    "CommandId": "cmd-m7uma92n",
    "InstanceIds": [
        "ins-yx05ky8j"
    ],
    "Type": "SCHEDULE",
    "ScheduleSettings": {
        "Policy": "ONCE",
        "InvokeTime": "2021-09-01T00:00:00+08:00"
    }
}
CreateInvoker.title: 创建单次执行器

CreateInvoker.document: 在北京时间每月1日零点，在实例 ins-yx05ky8j 执行命令 cmd-m7uma92n
CreateInvoker.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tat.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateInvoker
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Name": "cron-invoker",
    "CommandId": "cmd-m7uma92n",
    "InstanceIds": [
        "ins-yx05ky8j"
    ],
    "Type": "SCHEDULE",
    "ScheduleSettings": {
        "Policy": "RECURRENCE",
        "Recurrence": "0 0 1 * *"
    }
}
CreateInvoker.title: 创建周期执行命令
